name: Hot Buttered Rum

ingredients.name: cup/6 ounces very hot water just off the boil

instructions: In a mug or heat-proof glass, stir 1/4 cup of the very hot water with the dark brown sugar until the sugar dissolves. Add the rum. Fill the glass with the remaining hot water.
Float the pat of butter on top and stir it into the drink using the cinnamon stick.
